meta.description: Optimize the number of drills used in a gem factory to minimize the total number of drills while meeting processing and resource constraints.

sets.name: DRILLS
sets.description: Types of drills available in the factory

params.name: processing_capacity
params.description: Number of gems each drill type can process per day

params.name: water_requirement
params.description: Units of water required by each drill type per day

params.name: total_gems
params.description: Total number of gems that must be processed each day

params.name: total_water
params.description: Total units of water available each day

params.name: max_high_intensity_ratio
params.description: Maximum ratio of high intensity drills allowed

params.name: min_low_intensity_drills
params.description: Minimum number of low intensity drills required

vars.name: num_drills
vars.description: Number of each type of drill to be used

objective.name: min_total_drills
objective.description: Minimize the total number of drills used

constraints.name: gem_processing_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least 800 gems are processed each day

constraints.name: water_usage_limit
constraints.description: Ensure water usage does not exceed 700 units per day

constraints.name: high_intensity_drill_limit
constraints.description: At most 40% of the drills can be high intensity

constraints.name: min_low_intensity_drills
constraints.description: At least 10 low intensity drills must be used
